modName: Unrelenting Force and Ice Form Spells
summary: Exactly what it says on the tin learn unrelenting force and ice form as spells as well (this doesn\'t override the shout so it can be used in hand a swell as a shout)
descriptionHtml:
The two spell tomes can be found somewhere behind the jarls throne in the jarl longhouse in winterhold.

If there are any bugs please tell me but as i\'m new to modding I may not be able to help.
author: dwbangfire

files.name: Unrelenting Force and Ice Form Spells
